GSD.product_version: versions from v4.12 to before v5.10.150
GSD.description:
drm/omap: dss: Fix refcount leak bugs

This is an automated ID intended to aid in discovery of potential security vulnerabilities. The actual impact and attack plausibility have not yet been proven.
This ID is fixed in Linux Kernel version v5.10.150 by commit 1f340e1c1c74d11c45a6e32663829b26acd4f47b, it was introduced in version v4.12 by commit 09bffa6e519256c6fa1552d6ba1f5d594337a464. For more details please see the references link.

OSV.summary: drm/omap: dss: Fix refcount leak bugs
